mapper.select:
SELECT BOARD_NO, A.USER_ID, B.NICK, TITLE, CONTENT, HITS, BOARD_KIND, CASE WHEN BOARD_KIND = 'T_LAN' && FINISH_YN = 'N' THEN '판매중' WHEN BOARD_KIND = 'T_LAN' && FINISH_YN = 'Y' THEN '판매완료' WHEN BOARD_KIND = 'D_LAN' && FINISH_YN = 'N' THEN '나눔중' WHEN BOARD_KIND = 'D_LAN' && FINISH_YN = 'Y' THEN '나눔완료' END AS BOARD_KIND2, FINISH_YN, CATEGORY, CDATETIME, UDATETIME, CASE WHEN CURDATE() = DATE_FORMAT(CDATETIME,'%Y-%m-%d') then DATE_FORMAT(CDATETIME,'%H : %i : %s') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(CDATETIME,'%Y-%m-%d') END AS CDATETIME2, CASE WHEN CURDATE() = DATE_FORMAT(UDATETIME,'%Y-%m-%d') then DATE_FORMAT(UDATETIME,'%H : %i : %s') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(UDATETIME,'%Y-%m-%d') END AS UDATETIME2, DELETE_YN, SECRET_YN, ANSWER_YN, B.ADDR
FROM T4_BOARD A
LEFT JOIN T4_USER B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID
WHERE BOARD_KIND = 'T_LAN' AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
ORDER BY CDATETIME DESC
ORDER BY HITS DESC
LIMIT 5
LIMIT #{startNum}, 10

SELECT BOARD_NO, A.USER_ID, B.NICK, TITLE, CONTENT, HITS, BOARD_KIND, CASE WHEN BOARD_KIND = 'T_LAN' && FINISH_YN = 'N' THEN '판매중' WHEN BOARD_KIND = 'T_LAN' && FINISH_YN = 'Y' THEN '판매완료' WHEN BOARD_KIND = 'D_LAN' && FINISH_YN = 'N' THEN '나눔중' WHEN BOARD_KIND = 'D_LAN' && FINISH_YN = 'Y' THEN '나눔완료' END AS BOARD_KIND2, FINISH_YN, CATEGORY, CDATETIME, UDATETIME, CASE WHEN CURDATE() = DATE_FORMAT(CDATETIME,'%Y-%m-%d') then DATE_FORMAT(CDATETIME,'%H : %i : %s') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(CDATETIME,'%Y-%m-%d') END AS CDATETIME2, CASE WHEN CURDATE() = DATE_FORMAT(UDATETIME,'%Y-%m-%d') then DATE_FORMAT(UDATETIME,'%H : %i : %s') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(UDATETIME,'%Y-%m-%d') END AS UDATETIME2, DELETE_YN, SECRET_YN, ANSWER_YN, B.ADDR
FROM T4_BOARD A
LEFT JOIN T4_USER B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID
WHERE BOARD_KIND = 'D_LAN' AND DELETE_YN ='N'
ORDER BY CDATETIME DESC
ORDER BY HITS DESC
LIMIT 5
LIMIT #{startNum}, 10

SELECT BOARD_NO, A.USER_ID, B.NICK, TITLE, CONTENT, HITS, BOARD_KIND, CASE WHEN BOARD_KIND = 'T_LAN' && FINISH_YN = 'N' THEN '판매중' WHEN BOARD_KIND = 'T_LAN' && FINISH_YN = 'Y' THEN '판매완료' WHEN BOARD_KIND = 'D_LAN' && FINISH_YN = 'N' THEN '나눔중' WHEN BOARD_KIND = 'D_LAN' && FINISH_YN = 'Y' THEN '나눔완료' END AS BOARD_KIND2, FINISH_YN, CATEGORY, CDATETIME, UDATETIME, CASE WHEN CURDATE() = DATE_FORMAT(CDATETIME,'%Y-%m-%d') then DATE_FORMAT(CDATETIME,'%H : %i : %s') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(CDATETIME,'%Y-%m-%d') END AS CDATETIME2, CASE WHEN CURDATE() = DATE_FORMAT(UDATETIME,'%Y-%m-%d') then DATE_FORMAT(UDATETIME,'%H : %i : %s') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(UDATETIME,'%Y-%m-%d') END AS UDATETIME2, DELETE_YN, SECRET_YN, ANSWER_YN, B.ADDR
FROM T4_BOARD A
LEFT JOIN T4_USER B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID
WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
SELECT FILE_NO, BOARD_NO, ORLG_NAME, SAVE_NAME, CONCAT(FILE_PATH, SAVE_NAME) AS FILE_PATH, FILE_SIZE, FILE_KIND, CDATETIME FROM T4_FILES WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}

SELECT COMMENT_NO, BOARD_NO, A.USER_ID, NICK, CONTENT, COMMENT_RENO, CDATETIME, UDATETIME, CASE WHEN CURDATE() = DATE_FORMAT(CDATETIME,'%Y-%m-%d') then DATE_FORMAT(CDATETIME,'%H : %i : %s') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(CDATETIME,'%Y-%m-%d') END AS CDATETIME2, CASE WHEN CURDATE() = DATE_FORMAT(UDATETIME,'%Y-%m-%d') then DATE_FORMAT(UDATETIME,'%H : %i : %s') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(UDATETIME,'%Y-%m-%d') END AS UDATETIME2
FROM T4_COMMENT A
LEFT JOIN T4_USER B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID
WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
ORDER BY COMMENT_RENO;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T4_COMMENT ( COMMENT_NO, BOARD_NO, USER_ID, CONTENT, CDATETIME, UDATETIME, DELETE_YN) VALUES ( NULL, #{boardNo}, #{sessionId}, #{content}, NOW(), NOW(), 'N' )
mapper.update: UPDATE T4_COMMENT SET COMMENT_RENO = COMMENT_NO WHERE COMMENT_RENO IS NULL
UPDATE T4_BOARD SET BOARD_KIND = #{boardKind}, FINISH_YN = #{finishYn}, TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, UDATETIME = NOW() WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
UPDATE T4_COMMENT SET CONTENT = #{content}, UDATETIME = NOW() WHERE COMMENT_NO = #{commentNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T4_COMMENT ( COMMENT_NO, BOARD_NO, USER_ID, CONTENT, COMMENT_RENO, CDATETIME, UDATETIME, DELETE_YN ) VALUES ( NULL, #{boardNo}, #{sessionId}, #{content}, #{commentNo}, NOW(), NOW(), 'N' )
mapper.select:
SELECT A.FUNDING_NO, FUNDING_NAME, FUNDING_SUMMARY, FUNDING_SCRIPT, FUNDING_START_DT, FUNDING_END_DT, FUNDING_CLOSE_YN, FUNDING_GOAL_CNT, FUNDING_PRICE, FORMAT(FUNDING_PRICE , 0) AS FUNDING_PRICE2, CDATETIME, UDATETIME, CNT, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, NOW(), FUNDING_END_DT) AS D_DAY, CONCAT(IMG_PATH, IMG_NAME) AS IMG_PATH, DATE_FORMAT(FUNDING_END_DT,'%k') AS END_TIME
FROM T4_FUNDING A LEFT JOIN (SELECT FUNDING_NO, count(FUNDING_NO) as CNT FROM T4_FUNDING_MEMBER GROUP BY FUNDING_NO) B ON A.FUNDING_NO = B.FUNDING_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT FUNDING_NO, IMG_PATH, IMG_NAME FROM T4_F_IMAGE WHERE THUMBNAIL_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY FUNDING_NO) C ON A.FUNDING_NO = C.FUNDING_NO WHERE FUNDING_START_DT < NOW() AND FUNDING_CLOSE_YN = 'N'
ORDER BY FUNDING_END_DT
ORDER BY FUNDING_PRICE
ORDER BY FUNDING_PRICE DESC
LIMIT 2

SELECT A.FUNDING_NO, FUNDING_NAME, FUNDING_SUMMARY, FUNDING_SCRIPT, FUNDING_START_DT, FUNDING_END_DT, FUNDING_CLOSE_YN, FUNDING_GOAL_CNT, FUNDING_PRICE, FORMAT(FUNDING_PRICE , 0) AS FUNDING_PRICE2, CDATETIME, UDATETIME, CNT, TIMESTAMPDIFF(day, now(), FUNDING_END_DT) AS D_DAY, CASE WHEN DAYOFWEEK(FUNDING_START_DT) = 1 THEN '(일)' WHEN DAYOFWEEK(FUNDING_START_DT) = 2 THEN '(월)' WHEN DAYOFWEEK(FUNDING_START_DT) = 3 THEN '(화)' WHEN DAYOFWEEK(FUNDING_START_DT) = 4 THEN '(수)' WHEN DAYOFWEEK(FUNDING_START_DT) = 5 THEN '(목)' WHEN DAYOFWEEK(FUNDING_START_DT) = 6 THEN '(금)' WHEN DAYOFWEEK(FUNDING_START_DT) = 7 THEN '(토)' END AS DOW, DATE_FORMAT(FUNDING_START_DT, '%c/%e') AS S_DAY, DATE_FORMAT(FUNDING_START_DT, '%H') AS S_TIME, CONCAT(IMG_PATH, IMG_NAME) AS IMG_PATH
FROM T4_FUNDING A
LEFT JOIN (SELECT FUNDING_NO, count(FUNDING_NO) as CNT FROM T4_FUNDING_MEMBER GROUP BY FUNDING_NO) B ON A.FUNDING_NO = B.FUNDING_NO
LEFT JOIN (SELECT FUNDING_NO, IMG_PATH, IMG_NAME FROM T4_F_IMAGE WHERE THUMBNAIL_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY FUNDING_NO) C ON A.FUNDING_NO = C.FUNDING_NO
WHERE FUNDING_START_DT > NOW()
ORDER BY FUNDING_START_DT
ORDER BY FUNDING_PRICE
ORDER BY FUNDING_PRICE DESC
LIMIT 2

SELECT A.FUNDING_NO, FUNDING_NAME, FUNDING_SUMMARY, FUNDING_SCRIPT, FUNDING_START_DT, FUNDING_END_DT, FUNDING_CLOSE_YN, FUNDING_GOAL_CNT, FUNDING_PRICE, FORMAT(FUNDING_PRICE , 0) AS FUNDING_PRICE2, CDATETIME, UDATETIME, CNT, TIMESTAMPDIFF(day, now(), FUNDING_END_DT) AS D_DAY, CASE WHEN DAYOFWEEK(FUNDING_START_DT) = 1 THEN '(일)' WHEN DAYOFWEEK(FUNDING_START_DT) = 2 THEN '(월)' WHEN DAYOFWEEK(FUNDING_START_DT) = 3 THEN '(화)' WHEN DAYOFWEEK(FUNDING_START_DT) = 4 THEN '(수)' WHEN DAYOFWEEK(FUNDING_START_DT) = 5 THEN '(목)' WHEN DAYOFWEEK(FUNDING_START_DT) = 6 THEN '(금)' WHEN DAYOFWEEK(FUNDING_START_DT) = 7 THEN '(토)' END AS DOW, DATE_FORMAT(FUNDING_START_DT, '%c/%e') AS S_DAY, DATE_FORMAT(FUNDING_START_DT, '%H') AS S_TIME, CONCAT(IMG_PATH, C.IMG_NAME) AS IMG_PATH, DATE_FORMAT(FUNDING_START_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') AS START_DATE
FROM T4_FUNDING A
LEFT JOIN (SELECT FUNDING_NO, count(FUNDING_NO) as CNT FROM T4_FUNDING_MEMBER GROUP BY FUNDING_NO) B ON A.FUNDING_NO = B.FUNDING_NO
LEFT JOIN (SELECT FUNDING_NO, IMG_PATH, IMG_NAME FROM T4_F_IMAGE WHERE THUMBNAIL_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY FUNDING_NO) C ON A.FUNDING_NO = C.FUNDING_NO
WHERE A.FUNDING_NO = #{fundingNo};
SELECT FUNDING_NO, IMG_NAME, CONCAT(IMG_PATH, IMG_NAME) AS IMG_PATH_DETAIL FROM T4_F_IMAGE WHERE THUMBNAIL_YN = 'N' AND FUNDING_NO = #{fundingNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T4_FUNDING_MEMBER VALUES (#{fundingNo}, #{sessionId}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE T4_FUNDING SET FUNDING_CLOSE_YN = 'Y', UDATETIME = NOW() WHERE FUNDING_END_DT < NOW()
UPDATE T4_FUNDING SET FUNDING_CLOSE_YN = 'N', UDATETIME = NOW() WHERE FUNDING_END_DT > NOW()
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T4_FUNDING VALUES (NULL, #{fundingName}, #{fundingSummary}, #{content}, #{fundingStartDt}, #{fundingEndDt}, 'N', #{fundingGoalCnt}, #{fundingPrice}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE T4_FUNDING SET FUNDING_NAME = #{fundingName}, FUNDING_SUMMARY = #{fundingSummary}, FUNDING_SCRIPT = #{content}, FUNDING_START_DT = #{fundingStartDt}, FUNDING_END_DT = #{fundingEndDt}, FUNDING_GOAL_CNT = #{fundingGoalCnt}, FUNDING_PRICE = #{fundingPrice}, UDATETIME = NOW() WHERE FUNDING_NO = #{fundingNo}
mapper.select: SELECT IMG_NO, FUNDING_NO, IMG_ORG_NAME, THUMBNAIL_YN, CASE WHEN THUMBNAIL_YN = 'Y' THEN '썸네일' WHEN THUMBNAIL_YN = 'N' THEN '상품설명' END AS THUMBNAIL_YN2, FUNDING_INDEX, CONCAT(IMG_PATH, IMG_NAME) AS IMG_PATH, CDATETIME FROM T4_F_IMAGE WHERE FUNDING_NO = #{fundingNo} AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T4_F_IMAGE VALUES (NULL, #{fundingNo}, #{imgOrgName}, #{imgName}, #{imgPath}, #{imgSize}, 'Y', NULL, NOW(), NOW(),'N' )
INSERT INTO T4_F_IMAGE VALUES (NULL, #{fundingNo}, #{imgOrgName}, #{imgName}, #{imgPath}, #{imgSize}, 'N', SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(#{imgOrgName},'-',-1),'.',1), NOW(), NOW(),'N' )
mapper.update:
UPDATE T4_F_IMAGE SET DELETE_YN = 'Y' WHERE IMG_NO IN
#{item}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T4_BOARD ( BOARD_NO, USER_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, HITS, BOARD_KIND, FINISH_YN, CDATETIME, UDATETIME, DELETE_YN ) VALUES ( NULL, #{sessionId}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, #{boardKind}, 'N', NOW(), NOW(), 'N' )

INSERT INTO T4_FILES ( FILE_NO, BOARD_NO, ORLG_NAME, SAVE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_SIZE, FILE_KIND, CDATETIME) VALUES (NULL, #{boardNo}, #{orlgName}, #{saveName}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, #{fileKind}, now())
